errors.2fa.backup_code_used: This backup code has already been used.
errors.2fa.code_expired: The code sent by email expired.
errors.2fa.invalid_code: The code entered is not valid.
errors.2fa.setup_required: Please try to configure the double authentication method.
errors.app.already_enabled: Double authentication per application is already activated.
errors.app.not_enabled: Double application authentication is not activated.
errors.cannot_revoke_current_session: Impossible to revoke the current session.
errors.email.already_enabled: Double authentication by email is already activated.
errors.email.not_enabled: Double authentication by email is not activated.
errors.email_already_verified: Your email address is already verified
errors.email_not_verified: Your email address is not checked
errors.invalid_email: The format of the email address is not valid
errors.invalid_name: The name and first name must be between 3 and 30 characters
errors.invalid_password: The password does not fulfill all the criteria
errors.similar_password: You cannot use your current password as a new password.
errors.two_factor_required: Double factor authentication is required to connect.
errors.webauthn.authentication:
The verification of your access key has failed. 
Please try again later.
errors.webauthn.challenge_expired:
Your access key is not authentic. 
Please try again.
errors.webauthn.credential_not_found: Your access key does not correspond to any recorded key.
errors.webauthn.not_enabled: Authentication by access key is not activated for your account or no access key has been recorded.
errors.webauthn.registration_error:
The recording of the access key failed. 
Please try again later.
errors.webauthn.registration_failed:
Your access key could not be registered for security reasons. 
Please try again later.
info.2fa.no_methods: Please configure a double -factor authentication method to activate this option.
success.app.setup_initiated:
Double application authentication is configured. 
Please follow the indications to validate the operation.
success.code_sent: A code was sent by email.
success.email.code_resend: A new code has been sent by email.
success.email.disabled: Double authentication by email is deactivated.
success.email.enabled: Double authentication by email is activated.
success.email.setup_initiated:
The double authentication by email is configured. 
Please follow the indications to validate the operation.
success.emailchange1_sent: An email containing a code was sent to your current address.
success.emailchange2_sent:
Your email address has been changed. 
Please check it.
success.reset_email_sent: The password reset email was sent to the address provided
success.verification_email_resent: A new verification email was sent to your email address.
success.webauthn.credential_removed: Your access key has been deleted.
success.webauthn.disabled: Double authentication by access key is disabled.
success.webauthn.registration_options_ge:
Generated access key. 
Please follow the instructions to confirm the operation.
success.webauthn.registration_response_s: Your access key has been recorded.
